channel.title: Ridiculous-PK ll DDos Protections ll custom boss's ll 24-7 ll Many events!
channel.description:
[center] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/w7oe90.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/El9ldic.png[/img][url=http://ridiculouspkps.createaforum.com/]Forums[/url][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/El9ldic.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/El9ldic.png[/img][url=http://ridiculous-pk.co.uk]Website[/url][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/El9ldic.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/vetX3yN.png[/img][url=http://ridiculous-pk.co.uk/webclient.html]Webclient[/url][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/vetX3yN.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/vetX3yN.png[/img][url=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/69957337/client.jar]Desktop Client[/url][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/vetX3yN.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/cIuZpnI.png[/img][url=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/69957337/client.jar]Vote for rewards[/url][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/cIuZpnI.png[/img]
Create your own adventure be apart of something great.
Here at ridiculous-pk we stive for perfection, updating the players requests not ignoring them!
At Ridiculous-Pk we try to build our server around you and what you like out of servers you've played and we try our hardest to implement your ideas.
We host our server on a 4GB Ddos server that can hold up to 60 Players at any given time, we will increase our vps system as we grow so we can hold many more players.
[size=13pt]Features[/size]
Young Economy! 100% Godwars Dungeon Many more bosses! Even custom bosses! Pking Fully Working Abyss Duel/Staking 100% working vote system, and Vote Rewards! Fully working Special attacks. Crystal keys! Squeel of fortune! Revs! Fight caves! Kiln fight caves!
[size=13pt]Working Skills:[/size]
Smithing Fishing Farming Herblore Woodcutting Thieving Crafting Firemaking Cooking Dungeoneering Mining Melee Range Magic Ancients Lunar Magic Curses Prayer Runecrafting (Runespan in the process!) Agility Hunter Fletching Summoning
[size=13pt]Images:[/size]
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8_aR-eUtR_U&feature=youtu.be [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/6DBpF00.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/i41a8ls.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/RyBrNfH.png[/img]
[size=13pt]$15 up for grabs[/size] -Create a trailer for this server -work together to create it up to you -remember this is a compilation so there are more people up for it than you - video must be 1-2 minutes max - must show all features -Ends 14/08/14 [/center]
